sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>CreateIncidentGetName</keyword>
        <name>Create an incident (Get issue)</name>
        <next_intent>0555b24edb5db200d1a9f1351d961952</next_intent>
        <order/>
        <output_speech_format/>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes){
	var name = content.Name.value;
	userAttributes = {};
	userAttributes.name = name;
	var attrObj = {};
	attrObj.UserAttributes = userAttributes;
	
	var erb = new EchoResponseBuilder();
	erb.setOutputSpeech("PlainText", "Hello, " + name +  ". Tell me your issue by saying 'My issue is...' followed by your issue.", "");
	erb.setReprompt("PlainText", "I didn't catch that. Tell me your issue by saying 'My issue is...' followed by your issue.", "");
	erb.setAttributes(attrObj);
	erb.setEnd(false);
	result = erb.getResponse();
	
})(content, attributes);]]></script>
        <slot_name_1>Name</slot_name_1>
        <slot_name_2/>
        <slot_name_3/>
        <slot_type_1 display_value="AMAZON.LITERAL">d480c646dbd9b200d1a9f1351d9619a6</slot_type_1>
        <slot_type_2/>
        <slot_type_3/>
        <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-03-06 03:42:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8e95b24edb5db200d1a9f1351d9619d4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 02:02:30</sys_updated_on>
        <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent>
    </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent>
</record_update>
